Package demoworld.model

Class DiceRoller

Object
DiceRoller
public class DiceRoller extends Object
Responsible for managing rolling the dice pool (2 six-sided dice) required for this game with both, either or neither of the below sub conditions applied: advantage - roll 2 pools and take the highest. re-roll number's - any dice in a pool that rolls number can be re-rolled once. (i.e. if rolling 2 dice, and rerolling 1's and get 1,6 the 1 could be rerolled but if 1 is rolled again it will not be re-rolled as a part of that game roll action)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DiceRoller()
    Instantiate a version of the DiceRoller where the Dice are not using any provided seeds.
    DiceRoller(long seed)
    Instantiate a version of the DiceRoller where the Dice are using seeds based on a provided long value.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    roll()
    Attempts a game roll with the dice specified for the game , 2D6 by default
    int
    roll(boolean advantage)
    Overloaded method that checks if the roll should be rolled "with advantage", if so rolls an attempt twice and return the higher result.
    int
    roll(int rerollTargetNumber)
    Overloaded method that will reroll each dice once if they match a given number typically used for magical items or similar that let you re-roll 1's
    int
    roll(int rerollTargetNumber, boolean advantage)
    Overloaded method that will check for the combination of advantage AND a rerollable number Will do each roll with rerollTargetNumber, and if advantage is flagged take the highest.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DiceRoller

      public DiceRoller()
      Instantiate a version of the DiceRoller where the Dice are not using any provided seeds.

    • DiceRoller

      public DiceRoller(long seed)
      Instantiate a version of the DiceRoller where the Dice are using seeds based on a provided long value. [v1.2 update - to save always rolling "doubles" (if both dice were to use the same seed), set one Dice to use the provided seed and the second Dice to use seed + 1.]
      Parameters:
      seed - - The long seed that will be used as the base to seed the Dice instantiated for this dice roller.

  • Method Details

    • roll

      public int roll()
      Attempts a game roll with the dice specified for the game , 2D6 by default
      Returns:
      an int for the dice(s) total pre any Stat based modification

    • roll

      public int roll(boolean advantage)
      Overloaded method that checks if the roll should be rolled "with advantage", if so rolls an attempt twice and return the higher result.
      Parameters:
      advantage - indicates whether the dice is to be rolled more than once
      Returns:
      an int for the dice(s) total pre any Stat based modification

    • roll

      public int roll(int rerollTargetNumber)
      Overloaded method that will reroll each dice once if they match a given number typically used for magical items or similar that let you re-roll 1's
      Parameters:
      rerollTargetNumber - the target number to be checked against
      Returns:
      an int for the dice(s) total pre any Stat based modification

    • roll

      public int roll(int rerollTargetNumber, boolean advantage)
      Overloaded method that will check for the combination of advantage AND a rerollable number Will do each roll with rerollTargetNumber, and if advantage is flagged take the highest.
      Parameters:
      rerollTargetNumber - indicates what result to re-roll once on the dice
      advantage - indicates whether this roll should have advantage
      Returns:
      an int for the dice(s) total pre any Stat based modification
